title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection of 

Persons Who Report Breaches of Union Law) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (protection person report breach union law) regulation 2023

title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 22 July 2023.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 22 July 2023.

title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations – 

“Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27 
of 2022); 

“Principal Act” means the Protected Disclosures Act 2014 (No. 14 of 2014).
text_norm: 3 regulation - act 2022 mean protected disclosure (amendment) act 2022 (no 27 2022) principal act mean protected disclosure act 2014 (no 14 2014)

title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: 4. Section 5 (amended by section 6 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal Act
text_raw:
4. Section 5 (amended by section 6 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal Act 

is amended, in subsection (1), by the insertion of “7B,” after “7,”.

text_raw:
5. Section 5A (inserted by section 7 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal Act 

is amended, in subsection (2), by the insertion of “7B,” after “7,”.

title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: 6. Section 6A (inserted by section 9 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal Act
text_raw:
6. Section 6A (inserted by section 9 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal Act 
is amended, in subsection (1)(g)(iii), by the insertion of “in the manner specified 
in section 7B” after “European Union”.
text_norm: 6 section 6a (inserted section 9 act 2022) principal act amended subsection (1)(g)(iii) insertion manner specified section 7b european union

title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: 7. The Principal Act is amended by the insertion of the following section
text_raw:
7. The Principal Act is amended by the insertion of the following section 

after section 7A (inserted by section 11 of the Act of 2022): 

“Disclosure to relevant institutions, bodies, offices or agencies of 
European Union 

7B. 
worker – 

A disclosure is made in the manner specified in this section if the 

1 OJ No. L305, 26.11.2019, p. 17. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [375] 3 

(a) makes the disclosure to a relevant institution, body, office 

or agency of the European Union, and 

(b) has reasonable grounds to believe that the information on 
breaches reported was true at the time of reporting and that 
such information fell within the scope of the Directive.”.

title: “Act of 2022” means the Protected Disclosures (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 27
heading: 8. Section 10 (amended by section 13 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal
text_raw:
8. Section 10 (amended by section 13 of the Act of 2022) of the Principal 

Act is amended, in paragraph (c) – 

(a) 

in subparagraph (i), by the substitution of “as the case may be,” 
for “as the case may be, or”, 

(b) by the insertion of the following subparagraph after subparagraph 

(i): 

“(ia) has previously made a disclosure of substantially the same 
information in the manner specified in section 7B, or”, 

and 

(c) 

in subparagraph (ii)(II), by the insertion of “, 7B” after “7”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 July, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [375]
